resolvePaymentByConditions(bytes).details: HASH_LOCK should only be used for establishing multi-hop payments,  and is always required to be true for all transfer function logic types.  a pay with no condition or only true HASH_LOCK conditions will use max transfer amount.  The preimage order should align at the order of HASH_LOCK conditions in condition array.

resolvePaymentByConditions(bytes).notice: Resolve a payment by onchain getting its condition outcomes
